title: Station Modules
summary: Stations modules, not to be confused with Player Station modules, Make up stations and make up the majority of your time in stations
full_text:
Station Modules
Stations modules, not to be confused with Player Station modules, Make up stations and make up the majority of your time in stations
Cloning Bays
 
Cloning bays are a key part of gameplay, Used from the first time a player joins the game. They are maintained by CoreSEC and are only found in each of the six capital systems of the NPC factions. They are essential to maintaining life in the galaxy through cloning.
